text:
Serie A
Inter Milan: Lukaku exceeds Ronaldo!
Thanks to his double against Bologna last night (2-1), the Belgian striker has the luxury of exceeding a legend of the Italian club ...
03 Nov 2019, 14:40 by Rafael Da Silva



After two failures in C1 and C3, the Nerazzurri will try to do better for the coming season. The arrival of Antonio Conte is also synonymous with a new philosophy of play.Icon Sport



Samir HandanovicIcon Sport



Milan SkriniarIcon Sport



Stefan from VrijIcon Sport



Diego GodinIcon Sport



Kwadwo AsamoahIcon Sport



Nicolo BarellaIcon Sport



Radja NainggolanIcon Sport



Marcelo BrozovicIcon Sport



Valentino LazaroIcon Sport



Ivan PerisicIcon Sport



Lautaro MartinezIcon Sport

Inter Milan: the possible eleven of the season

Last night, Inter Milan moved on the field of Bologna on behalf of the 11th day. In case of victory, the Nerazzurri could put pressure on Juventus temporarily taking the chair of leader. And all was not won for the Lombards, led 1-0 until the 75th. Romelu Lukaku would finally put on his hero costume by scoring a double, allowing his team to clinch a 9th win in Serie A.




The Belgian exceeds R9!




The Belgian is 2nd in the scoring charts in Serie A + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

With this double, Romelu Lukaku has 9 goals in 11 Serie A games, ranking second best scorer in the championship behind Ciro Immobile and his 12 goals. And the Belgian media La Derni√®re Heure reveals a statistic that should give a smile to the former player of Everton or Manchester United. Indeed, the Belgian international (84 caps, 53 goals) has just exceeded the Brazilian Ronaldo (1997-2002) in terms of goals on the start of the season, the Brazilian having scored 8 goals in 11 games in the season 1997- 1998.
